languages.text: "Боль — лишь отражение твоей слабости, {name}. Отринь слабость духа ради величия — это единственный путь к вершинам, которые достойны Вольного Торговца".
"Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Боль — лишь отражение твоей слабости, {name}. Отринь слабость духа ради величия — это единственный путь к вершинам, которые достойны Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce the weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."

"Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “疼痛不过是弱点的倒影罢了，{name}。只有摒弃精神上的弱点，踏上通往伟大的道途，才能配得上行商浪人的崇高地位。”
languages.original_text: "Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “疼痛不过是弱点的倒影罢了，{name}。只有摒弃精神上的弱点，踏上通往伟大的道途，才能配得上行商浪人的崇高地位。”

languages.text: «El dolor es solo reflejo de la propia debilidad, {name}. Renunciar a la debilidad del espíritu para buscar la grandeza es el único camino digno de una Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «El dolor es solo reflejo de la propia debilidad, {name}. Renunciar a la debilidad del espíritu para buscar la grandeza es el único camino digno de una Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「痛みはその人の弱さの反映にすぎません、{name}。偉大さを追求するために精神の弱さを放棄することは、自由開拓者にふさわしい高みに届くための唯一の道です」
languages.original_text: "Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「痛みはその人の弱さの反映にすぎません、{name}。偉大さを追求するために精神の弱さを放棄することは、ローグトレーダーにふさわしい高みに届くための唯一の道です」
「痛みはその人の弱さの反映にすぎません、{name}。偉大さを追求するために精神の弱さを放棄することは、自由開拓者にふさわしい高みに届くための唯一の道です」

languages.text: « La douleur n'est que l'expression de la faiblesse d'une personne, {name}. Renoncer à la faiblesse de l'esprit pour atteindre la grandeur est la seule voie digne d'un libre-marchand. »
languages.original_text: "Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « La douleur n'est que l'expression de la faiblesse d'une personne, {name}. Renoncer à la faiblesse de l'esprit pour atteindre la grandeur est la seule voie digne d'un libre-marchand. »

languages.text: "Schmerzen sind nur ein Abbild eigener Schwäche, {name}. Zugunsten wahrer Größe die Schwäche des Geistes zu überwinden, ist der einzige Weg in die Höhen, die {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} würdig sind."
languages.original_text: "Pain is but a reflection of one's weakness, {name}. To renounce weakness of spirit in pursuit of greatness is the only path to heights worthy of a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: "Acı, kişinin zayıflığının yansımasından ibarettir {name}. Azamete giden yolda ruhun zayıflığından kurtulmak, Hür Tacirlere yakışan yüceliğe ulaşmanın tek yoludur."
